string.name: app_about
string.translation_description: A brief description of the app, for use in the About dialog.

resources.string: TabsLite è un\'app gratuita ed open source per accordi di chitarra con oltre un milione di canzoni disponibili, che utilizza i popolari database di accordi esistenti. È costruita per essere veloce e semplice, 100% gratis e senza pubblicità. Gestito da More Than Solitaire, Inc, a 501(c)(3), un ente senza scopo di lucro dedicato all\'apprendimento del software.

string.name: app_action_export_playlists
string.translation_description: The button text to export playlists

string.name: app_action_import_playlists
string.translation_description: The button text to export playlists

string.name: app_action_leave_review
string.translation_description: The button text to leave a review

string.name: app_action_donate
string.translation_description: The button text to donate to TabsLite

string.name: app_action_search
string.translation_description: The placeholder text for the search bar

string.name: app_action_description_search
string.translation_description: The accessibility text for the Search action

string.name: app_action_description_create_playlist
string.translation_description: Accessibility text for Create Playlist button

string.name: app_icon_description_half_star
string.translation_description: Accessibility text for a half star icon

string.name: app_icon_description_filled_star
string.translation_description: Accessibility text for a full star icon

string.name: title_favorites_playlist
string.translation_description: The title of the Favorites playlist/home tab

string.name: title_popular_playlist
string.translation_description: The title of the Popular playlist/home tab

string.name: title_playlists_page
string.translation_description: The title of the Playlists home tab

string.name: title_add_to_playlist_dialog
string.translation_description: The title of the Add To Playlist dialog

string.name: title_create_playlist_dialog
string.translation_description: Title for the Create Playlist dialog

string.name: placeholder_playlist_title
string.translation_description: Placeholder text for Playlist Title entry field

string.name: placeholder_playlist_description
string.translation_description: Placeholder text for Playlist Description entry field

string.name: capo_zero
string.translation_description: The capo text used when the capo is not used

string.name: capo_11
string.translation_description: The capo text used when the capo is 11

string.name: capo_12
string.translation_description: The capo text used when the capo is 12

string.name: capo_13
string.translation_description: The capo text used when the capo is 13

string.name: capo_number_ending_in_1
string.translation_description: The capo text when the capo is a number ending in 1 (except for 11)

string.name: capo_number_ending_in_2
string.translation_description: The capo text when the capo is a number ending in 2 (except for 12)

string.name: capo_number_ending_in_3
string.translation_description: The capo text when the capo is a number ending in 3 (except for 13)

string.name: capo_generic
string.translation_description: The capo text when the capo doesn't meet any of the other criteria

string.name: sort_by
string.translation_description: Formatted string used in conjunction with the following options to display a button to choose what order songs should be sorted by. %s represents one of the options below (e.g. Date Added)

string.name: sort_by_date_added
string.translation_description: Used to pick what order to show songs in - most recent first

string.name: sort_by_popularity
string.translation_description: Used to pick what order to show songs in - most popular first

string.name: sort_by_artist_name
string.translation_description: Used to pick what order to show songs in - artist name, a to z

string.name: sort_by_title
string.translation_description: Used to pick what order to show songs in - song title, a to z

string.name: message_chord_load_failed
string.translation_description: Error message shown when chord could not be loaded. %s represents the name of the chord that couldn't be loaded

resources.string: Impossibile caricare gli accordi \'%s\'. Controlla la tua connessione internet.

string.name: message_no_search_results
string.translation_description: Info message shown when there are no results to a search query. This could be due to an internet connection issue.

resources.string: Nessun risultato di ricerca. Controlla la tua ricerca o la tua connessione internet.

string.name: message_empty_list
string.translation_description: Default info message when there are no items in a list

string.name: tab_version_abbreviation
string.translation_description: Shortened version number for display in places where space is limited (like in search results)
